XenotypeDef.label: Cascadia
XenotypeDef.description: In the forests of old Cascadia, the sky froze before the earth burned. When nuclear winter blanketed the Northwest, small enclaves learned to live beneath the ash and snow. They are stoic, quiet survivalistsâ€”hunters, herbalists, and scavengers who built warmth from ruin. The cold sharpened them, and they speak in whispers like the wind through pine needles.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Descendants of nuclear winter survivors from the misty ruins of the Pacific Northwest.
